name: http-message-signatures-extension
description: Enterprise browser extension adding an HTTP Message signature to all requests

scripts.build:chrome: tsup src/background.ts --format esm --platform browser --target chrome100 --publicDir platform/mv3/chromium --clean --out-dir dist/mv3/chromium --external node:crypto
scripts.bundle:chrome: npm run build:chrome && mkdir -p dist/web-ext-artifacts && crx pack --private-key signing-key.pem --output dist/web-ext-artifacts/http-message-signatures-extension.crx dist/mv3/chromium

author: Thibault Meunier
